Hello everyone.
I found this website through searching internet. i need to do a 
report on the movie "The Last Samurai". I saw the movie and found it 
extremely interesting. i am new to this subject so i dont have my 
facts right. please if anyone can  help me to analyze the right and 
wrong parts of the movie according to the history,i will really 
appreciate it.
i will like the reponds to be sent at my email address. that is
